verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to give the more earnest <S%G4337>heed<s%> <S%G4056><s%> to the things which we have <S%G191>heard,<s%> lest at any <S%G3379>time<s%> we should let them <S%G3901>slip.<s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> shall <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1628>escape,<s%> if we <S%G272>neglect<s%> so <S%G5082>great<s%> <S%G4991>salvation;<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> at the first <S%G2983>began<s%> <S%G746><s%> to be <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G950>confirmed<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> them that <S%G191>heard<s%> him;

God <S%G2316><s%> also bearing them <S%G4901>witness,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> with <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5059>wonders,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> with <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G1411>miracles,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3311>gifts<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G2308>will?<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> unto the <S%G32>angels<s%> hath he <S%G3756>not<s%> put in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3625>world<s%> to <S%G3195>come,<s%> <S%G4012>whereof<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2980>speak.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> in a certain <S%G4225>place<s%> <S%G1263>testified,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou art <S%G3403>mindful<s%> of <S%G846>him?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G1980>visitest<s%> <S%G846>him?<s%>

Thou <S%G1642>madest<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a little <S%G5100>lower<s%> <S%G1024><s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G32>angels;<s%> thou <S%G4737>crownedst<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> with <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> didst <S%G2525>set<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> hands: <S%G5495><s%>

Thou hast put all things in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> in that he put all in subjection <S%G5293>under<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> that is not put <S%G506>under<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> we <S%G3708>see<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> put <S%G5293>under<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> who was made a little <S%G1642>lower<s%> <S%G1024><s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3804>suffering<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G4737>crowned<s%> with <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor;<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> he by the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> should <S%G1089>taste<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> every <S%G3956>man.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it <S%G4241>became<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things,<s%> in <S%G71>bringing<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> to make the captain of their salvation <S%G5048>perfect<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G747><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4991><s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> he that <S%G37>sanctifieth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they who are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1520>one:<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> he is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> I will <S%G518>declare<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> unto <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> will I sing <S%G5214>praise<s%> unto <S%G4571>thee.<s%>

Forasmuch <S%G1893><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> as <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3813>children<s%> are <S%G2841>partakers<s%> of <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> himself <S%G3898>likewise<s%> took <S%G3348>part<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> he might <S%G2673>destroy<s%> him that <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2904>power<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> that <S%G5123>is,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1228>devil;<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1222>verily<s%> he took not <S%G1949>on<s%> <S%G3756><s%> him the nature of <S%G32>angels;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> he took <S%G1949>on<s%> him the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G3606><s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> it <S%G3784>behooved<s%> him to be made like <S%G3666>unto<s%> his <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G1096>be<s%> a <S%G1655>merciful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> high <S%G749>priest<s%> in <S%G4314>things<s%> pertaining to <S%G2316>God,<s%> to make reconciliation <S%G2433>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> himself hath <S%G3958>suffered<s%> being <S%G3985>tempted,<s%> he is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G997>succor<s%> them that are <S%G3985>tempted.<s%>
